ygData.subject: Re: instrument switching and inventory
ygData.msgSnippet: Er, don t you drop it while weaving songs and selecting mobs and moving around and looking around? ... Jesse  http://www.lumiere.net/
ygData.messageBody:
Er, don't you drop it while weaving songs and selecting mobs and moving
around and looking around?

> I know a lot of people don't trust it, but here's what I do. I leave my shield
> (or second weapon) on my cursor. If you die or get disconnected the item just
> goes back into your inventory so it is safe.
>
> Taelin
>
> > I was wondering, is there any trick to keeping those inventory slots open
> > (i.e. free of random loot) without manually having to put every item into
> > a bag? I bought a mandolin and horn to fill 2 more slots, but there's
> > still 1 empty slot (which needs to stay empty, so when I swap out 1
> > instrument, there's room for a shield + weapon). Anytime I look anything
> > it gets automatically dropped into that slot, which is very annoying when
> > trying to switch weapons later.
> >
> > Hopefully there's some good tips out there.
> >
> > Thanks, =)
> >
> > ---
> > Jesse <j@...>
